sections.heading: Repealed.Section 24-6A-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1995, ch. 116, § 1; 2000, ch. 54, § 1; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 323, § 35.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 323, § 35 repealed 24-6A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1995, ch. 116, § 1, relating to definitions of the Uniform Anatomical Gift Act, effective July 1, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:

For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
